249:       if (a.status === "pending" && b.status !== "pending") return -1;
250:       if (a.status !== "pending" && b.status === "pending") return 1;
251: 
252:       // Then sort by time
253:       const timeA = a.time.split(":").map(Number);
254:       const timeB = b.time.split(":").map(Number);
255: 
256:       if (timeA[0] !== timeB[0]) return timeA[0] - timeB[0]; // Sort by hour
257:       return timeA[1] - timeB[1]; // Sort by minute
258:     });
259:   };
260: 
261:   // Group reservations by status
262:   const groupedReservations = {
263:     today: sortReservations(reservations.filter((r) => r.status === "pending")),
264:     upcoming: sortReservations(
265:       reservations.filter((r) => r.status === "confirmed")
266:     ),
267:     past: sortReservations(
268:       reservations.filter(
269:         (r) => r.status !== "pending" && r.status !== "confirmed"
270:       )
271:     ),
272:   };
273: 
274:   // Handler functions with alerts for testing
275:   const handleConfirm = (id) => {
276:     Alert.alert(
277:       "Confirm Reservation",
278:       `Reservation #${id} has been CONFIRMED.`,
279:       [{ text: "OK" }]
280:     );
281:     // Here you would update the reservation status in your state or database
282:   };
283: 
284:   const handleCancel = (id) => {
285:     Alert.alert("Cancel Reservation", `Reservation #${id} has been CANCELED.`, [
286:       { text: "OK" },
287:     ]);
288:     // Here you would update the reservation status in your state or database
289:   };
290: 
291:   // Action renderers - Pure functions that return appropriate action UI
292:   const renderRightActions = (progress, dragX) => {
293:     return (
294:       <ActionContainer color={COLORS.CONFIRMED.bg}>
295:         <MaterialIcons name="check-circle" size={24} color="white" />
296:         <ActionText>CONFIRM</ActionText>
297:       </ActionContainer>
298:     );
299:   };
300: 
301:   const renderLeftActions = (progress, dragX) => {
302:     return (
303:       <ActionContainer color={COLORS.CANCELED.bg}>
304:         <MaterialIcons name="cancel" size={24} color="white" />
305:         <ActionText>CANCEL</ActionText>
306:       </ActionContainer>
307:     );
308:   };
309: 
310:   // Card renderer
311:   const renderReservationCard = ({ item }) => {
312:     const isExpanded = expandedId === item.id;
313: 
314:     return (
315:       <Swipeable
316:         ref={(ref) => {
317:           if (ref && expandedId === item.id) {
318:             swipeableRef.current = ref;
319:           }
320:         }}
321:         friction={2}
322:         leftThreshold={40}
323:         rightThreshold={40}
324:         renderLeftActions={renderLeftActions}
325:         renderRightActions={renderRightActions}
326:         onSwipeableLeftOpen={() => handleCancel(item.id)}
327:         onSwipeableRightOpen={() => handleConfirm(item.id)}
328:         onSwipeableWillOpen={(direction) => {
329:           // Close previous swipeable
330:           if (swipeableRef.current && expandedId !== item.id) {
331:             swipeableRef.current.close();
332:           }
333:           // Log for debugging
334:           console.log(`Swiping ${direction} for reservation #${item.id}`);
335:           setExpandedId(item.id);
336:         }}
337:         containerStyle={{ backgroundColor: "transparent" }}
338:         childrenContainerStyle={{ backgroundColor: "white" }}
339:       >
340:         <ReservationCard
341:           status={item.status}
342:           onPress={() => setExpandedId(expandedId === item.id ? null : item.id)}
343:         >
344:           <StatusIndicator status={item.status}>
345:             <StatusText status={item.status}>
346:               {item.status.toUpperCase()}
347:             </StatusText>
348:           </StatusIndicator>
349: 
350:           <CardTitle numberOfLines={1} ellipsizeMode="tail">
351:             {item.customerName}
352:           </CardTitle>
353: 
354:           <DetailRow>
355:             <DetailIcon name="access-time" color="#757575" />
356:             <DetailText>
357:               {item.time} ({item.duration} min)
358:             </DetailText>
359:           </DetailRow>
360: 
361:           <DetailRow>
362:             <DetailIcon name="people" color="#757575" />
363:             <DetailText>
364:               {item.people} {item.people > 1 ? "people" : "person"}
365:             </DetailText>
366:           </DetailRow>
367: 
368:           {!isExpanded ? (
369:             <DetailRow>
370:               <DetailIcon name="event-seat" color="#757575" />
371:               <DetailText numberOfLines={1} ellipsizeMode="tail">
372:                 {item.isCounterSeat
373:                   ? `Counter: ${item.counterSeatId}`
374:                   : `Table: ${item.tableId}`}
375:               </DetailText>
376:             </DetailRow>
377:           ) : (
378:             <>
379:               <DetailRow>
380:                 <DetailIcon name="event-seat" color="#757575" />
381:                 <DetailText>
382:                   {item.isCounterSeat
383:                     ? `Counter Seat: ${item.counterSeatId}`
384:                     : `Table: ${item.tableId}`}
385:                 </DetailText>
386:               </DetailRow>
387:               {item.note && (
388:                 <DetailRow>
389:                   <DetailIcon name="notes" color="#757575" />
390:                   <DetailText>{item.note}</DetailText>
391:                 </DetailRow>
392:               )}
393:             </>
394:           )}
395:         </ReservationCard>
396:       </Swipeable>
397:     );
398:   };
399: 
400:   // Section header renderer
401:   const renderSectionHeader = (title, count) => (
402:     <SectionHeader>
403:       <SectionHeaderText>
404:         {title} ({count})
405:       </SectionHeaderText>
406:     </SectionHeader>
407:   );
408: 
409:   // Combine all sections into a flat array for FlatList
410:   const sections = [
411:     { key: "hint", type: "hint" },
412:     {
413:       key: "pendingHeader",
414:       type: "header",
415:       title: "Pending Reservations",
416:       count: groupedReservations.today.length,
417:     },
418:     ...groupedReservations.today.map((item) => ({
419:       key: `pending-${item.id}`,
420:       type: "item",
421:       item,
422:     })),
423:     {
424:       key: "upcomingHeader",
425:       type: "header",
426:       title: "Confirmed Reservations",
427:       count: groupedReservations.upcoming.length,
428:     },
429:     ...groupedReservations.upcoming.map((item) => ({
430:       key: `upcoming-${item.id}`,
431:       type: "item",
432:       item,
433:     })),
434:     {
435:       key: "pastHeader",
436:       type: "header",
437:       title: "Past Reservations",
438:       count: groupedReservations.past.length,
439:     },
440:     ...groupedReservations.past.map((item) => ({
441:       key: `past-${item.id}`,
442:       type: "item",
443:       item,
444:     })),
445:   ];
446: 
447:   const renderItem = ({ item }) => {
448:     switch (item.type) {
449:       case "hint":
450:         return hintVisible ? (
451:           <SwipeHintContainer style={{ opacity: fadeAnim }}>
452:             <SwipeHintText>
453:               ← Swipe LEFT to CANCEL{"\n"}
454:               Swipe RIGHT to CONFIRM →
455:             </SwipeHintText>
456:           </SwipeHintContainer>
457:         ) : null;
458:       case "header":
459:         return renderSectionHeader(item.title, item.count);
460:       case "item":
461:         return renderReservationCard({ item: item.item });
462:       default:
463:         return null;
464:     }
465:   };
466: 
467:   if (!reservations || reservations.length === 0) {
468:     return (
469:       <NoReservationsContainer>
470:         <MaterialIcons name="event-busy" size={60} color="#757575" />
471:         <NoReservationsText>No reservations found</NoReservationsText>
472:       </NoReservationsContainer>
473:     );
474:   }
475: 
476:   return (
477:     <GestureHandlerRootView style={{ flex: 1 }}>
478:       <Container>
479:         <FlatList
480:           ref={flatListRef}
481:           data={sections}
482:           renderItem={renderItem}
483:           keyExtractor={(item) => item.key}
484:           onScroll={handleScroll}
485:           scrollEventThrottle={16}
486:         />
487:       </Container>
488:     </GestureHandlerRootView>
489:   );
490: };
491: 
492: export default ReservationsMailbox;

================
File: src/features/merchant/reservations/screens/MerchantReservationsScreen.js
================
 1: import React, { useState } from "react";
 2: import { SafeArea } from "../../../../components/SafeArea/SafeArea";
 3: import { seatingData, merchantReservations } from "../../../../data/mockData";
 4: import { generateTimeSlots } from "../utils/timeUtils";
 5: import ReservationsGrid from "../components/ReservationsGrid";
 6: import ReservationsMailbox from "../components/ReservationsMailbox";
 7: import {
 8:   TabBar,
 9:   Tab,
10:   TabText,
11: } from "../components/ReservationComponents.styles";
12: import { MaterialIcons } from "@expo/vector-icons";
13: import styled from "styled-components/native";
14: 
15: const Container = styled.View`
16:   flex: 1;
17:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.primary};
18: `;
19: 
20: 
21: const TABS = {
22:   GRID: "grid",
23:   SMART: "smart",
24:   MAILBOX: "mailbox",
25: };
26: 
27: export const MerchantReservationsScreen = () => {
28:   const timeSlots = generateTimeSlots();
29:   const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(TABS.GRID);
30: 
31:   return (
32:     <SafeArea>
33:       <Container>
34:         <TabBar>
35:           <Tab
36:             active={activeTab === TABS.GRID}
37:             onPress={() => setActiveTab(TABS.GRID)}
38:             activeOpacity={0.6}
39:           >
40:             <MaterialIcons
41:               name="grid-on"
42:               size={20}
43:               color={activeTab === TABS.GRID ? "#262626" : "#757575"}
44:             />
45:             <TabText active={activeTab === TABS.GRID}>Grid View</TabText>
46:           </Tab>
47: 
48:           <Tab
49:             active={activeTab === TABS.SMART}
50:             onPress={() => setActiveTab(TABS.SMART)}
51:             activeOpacity={0.6}
52:           >
53:             <MaterialIcons
54:               name="auto-awesome"
55:               size={20}
56:               color={activeTab === TABS.SMART ? "#262626" : "#757575"}
57:             />
58:             <TabText active={activeTab === TABS.SMART}>Smart View</TabText>
59:           </Tab>
60: 
61:           <Tab
62:             active={activeTab === TABS.MAILBOX}
63:             onPress={() => setActiveTab(TABS.MAILBOX)}
64:             activeOpacity={0.6}
65:           >
66:             <MaterialIcons
67:               name="mail"
68:               size={20}
69:               color={activeTab === TABS.MAILBOX ? "#262626" : "#757575"}
70:             />
71:             <TabText active={activeTab === TABS.MAILBOX}>Inbox</TabText>
72:           </Tab>
73:         </TabBar>
74: 
75:         {activeTab === TABS.MAILBOX ? (
76:           <ReservationsMailbox reservations={merchantReservations} />
77:         ) : (
78:           <ReservationsGrid
79:             timeSlots={timeSlots}
80:             tables={seatingData.tables}
81:             counterSeats={seatingData.counterSeats}
82:             reservations={merchantReservations}
83:             isSmartSorting={activeTab === TABS.SMART}
84:           />
85:         )}
86:       </Container>
87:     </SafeArea>
88:   );
89: };

================
File: src/features/merchant/reservations/utils/timeUtils.js
================
 1: export const generateTimeSlots = () => {
 2:   const slots = [];
 3:   for (let hour = 9; hour <= 22; hour++) {
 4:     const hourStr = hour.toString().padStart(2, "0");
 5:     slots.push(`${hourStr}:00`);
 6:     slots.push(`${hourStr}:30`);
 7:   }
 8:   return slots;
 9: };
10: 
11: 
12: 
13: 
14: 
15: 
16: export const calculateCurrentTimePosition = (timeSlotHeight) => {
17:   const now = new Date();
18:   const hours = now.getHours();
19:   const minutes = now.getMinutes();
20: 
21: 
22:   if (hours < 9 || (hours === 22 && minutes > 30) || hours > 22) {
23:     return -100;
24:   }
25: 
26:   const minutesSince9AM = (hours - 9) * 60 + minutes;
27:   return (minutesSince9AM / 30) * timeSlotHeight;
28: };
29: 
30: 
31: 
32: 
33: 
34: 
35: export const parseTimeString = (timeString) => {
36:   return timeString.split(":").map(Number);
37: };
38: 
39: 
40: 
41: 
42: 
43: 
44: export const convertToMinutesSince9AM = (timeString) => {
45:   const [hours, minutes] = parseTimeString(timeString);
46:   return (hours - 9) * 60 + minutes;
47: };
48: 
49: 
50: 
51: 
52: 
53: 
54: export const getTimeSlotIndex = (timeString) => {
55:   const minutesSince9AM = convertToMinutesSince9AM(timeString);
56:   return Math.floor(minutesSince9AM / 30);
57: };
58: 
59: 
60: 
61: 
62: 
63: 
64: export const formatTimeFromDate = (date) => {
65:   const hours = date.getHours().toString().padStart(2, "0");
66:   const minutes = date.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, "0");
67:   return `${hours}:${minutes}`;
68: };
69: 
70: 
71: 
72: 
73: 
74: 
75: export const generateCurrentDayTimes = (count = 5) => {
76:   let timesArray = [];
77:   let current = new Date();
78:   current.setSeconds(0);
79:   current.setMilliseconds(0);
80: 
81: 
82:   const minutes = current.getMinutes();
83:   current.setMinutes(minutes >= 30 ? 30 : 0);
84: 
85:   for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
86:     timesArray.push(formatTimeFromDate(current));
87:     current.setMinutes(current.getMinutes() + 30);
88:   }
89:   return timesArray;
90: };

================
File: src/features/merchant/settings/screens/MerchantSettingsScreen.js
================
  1: import React from "react";
  2: import { TouchableOpacity, View } from "react-native";
  3: import { Avatar } from "react-native-paper";
  4: import { MaterialIcons } from "@expo/vector-icons";
  5: import styled from "styled-components/native";
  6: 
  7: import { SafeArea } from "../../../../components/SafeArea/SafeArea";
  8: import { CustomText } from "../../../../components/CustomText/CustomText";
  9: import { useAuthentication } from "../../../../services/AuthenticationContext";
 10: 
 11: const merchantProfile = {
 12:   name: "Restaurant Owner",
 13:   email: "restaurant@example.com",
 14:   restaurantName: "Gourmet Delights",
 15:   profileImage: require("../../../../../assets/images/user_profile.jpg"),
 16:   phoneNumber: "+81 80 6748 5678",
 17: };
 18: 
 19: const SettingsContainer = styled.ScrollView`
 20:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.primary};
 21:   flex: 1;
 22:   margin: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
 23: `;
 24: 
 25: const ProfileContainer = styled.View`
 26:   flex-direction: row;
 27:   justify-content: space-between;
 28:   align-items: center;
 29:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 30:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.primary};
 31:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 32: `;
 33: 
 34: const UserInfoContainer = styled.View`
 35:   flex: 1;
 36:   margin-right: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 37:   align-items: flex-start;
 38: `;
 39: 
 40: const AvatarContainer = styled.View`
 41:   align-items: center;
 42:   justify-content: center;
 43: `;
 44: 
 45: const EmailText = styled(CustomText)`
 46:   color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.text.secondary};
 47: `;
 48: 
 49: const RestaurantNameText = styled(CustomText)`
 50:   color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.text.primary};
 51:   font-weight: ${(props) => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
 52: `;
 53: 
 54: const StatusBadge = styled.View`
 55:   background-color: #4caf50;
 56:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]} ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 57:   border-radius: 12px;
 58:   margin-top: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 59:   align-self: flex-start;
 60: `;
 61: 
 62: const StatusText = styled(CustomText)`
 63:   color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.text.inverse};
 64:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.caption};
 65:   font-weight: ${(props) => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
 66: `;
 67: 
 68: const SectionTitle = styled(CustomText)`
 69:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 70:   font-weight: ${(props) => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
 71:   color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.text.secondary};
 72:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.caption};
 73: `;
 74: 
 75: const SettingsItemRow = styled(TouchableOpacity)`
 76:   flex-direction: row;
 77:   align-items: center;
 78:   padding-vertical: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 79:   padding-horizontal: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 80:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.primary};
 81: `;
 82: 
 83: const SettingsItemText = styled.View`
 84:   flex: 1;
 85:   margin-left: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 86: `;
 87: 
 88: const SectionContainer = styled.View`
 89:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 90: `;
 91: 
 92: export const MerchantSettingsScreen = ({ navigation }) => {
 93:   const { onLogout } = useAuthentication();
 94: 
 95: 
 96:   const accountItems = [
 97:     {
 98:       title: "Profile Settings",
 99:       subtitle: "Edit your personal information",
100:       icon: "person",
101:       onPress: () => {},
102:     },
103:     {
104:       title: "Restaurant Information",
105:       subtitle: "Update restaurant details",
106:       icon: "store",
107:       onPress: () => navigation.navigate("RestaurantEdit"),
108:     },
109:     {
110:       title: "Menu Management",
111:       subtitle: "Add, edit, or remove menu items",
112:       icon: "restaurant-menu",
113:       onPress: () => {},
114:     },
115:   ];
116: 
117: 
118:   const businessItems = [
119:     {
120:       title: "Seating Layout",
121:       subtitle: "Manage tables and seating arrangement",
122:       icon: "chair",
123:       onPress: () => navigation.navigate("Home"),
124:     },
125:     {
126:       title: "Reservation Settings",
127:       subtitle: "Configure reservation rules and availability",
128:       icon: "event",
129:       onPress: () => navigation.navigate("Reservations"),
130:     },
131:     {
132:       title: "Business Hours",
133:       subtitle: "Set your restaurant opening hours",
134:       icon: "schedule",
135:       onPress: () => {},
136:     },
137:   ];
138: 
139: 
140:   const systemItems = [
141:     {
142:       title: "Notifications",
143:       subtitle: "Manage notification preferences",
144:       icon: "notifications",
145:       onPress: () => {},
146:     },
147:     {
148:       title: "Payment Methods",
149:       subtitle: "Configure payment options",
150:       icon: "payment",
151:       onPress: () => {},
152:     },
153:     {
154:       title: "Help & Support",
155:       subtitle: "Contact customer support",
156:       icon: "help",
157:       onPress: () => {},
158:     },
159:     {
160:       title: "Logout",
161:       subtitle: "Sign out from your account",
162:       icon: "logout",
163:       iconColor: (props) => props.theme.colors.text.error,
164:       onPress: onLogout,
165:     },
166:   ];
167: 
168:   const renderSettingsItems = (items) => {
169:     return items.map((item, index) => (
170:       <SettingsItemRow key={index} onPress={item.onPress}>
171:         <MaterialIcons
172:           name={item.icon}
173:           size={24}
174:           color={item.iconColor || "#262626"}
175:         />
176:         <SettingsItemText>
177:           <CustomText variant="body" style={{ fontWeight: "bold" }}>
178:             {item.title}
179:           </CustomText>
180:           <CustomText variant="body" style={{ color: "#757575" }}>
181:             {item.subtitle}
182:           </CustomText>
183:         </SettingsItemText>
184:         <MaterialIcons name="chevron-right" size={24} color="#757575" />
185:       </SettingsItemRow>
186:     ));
187:   };
188: 
189:   return (
190:     <SafeArea>
191:       <SettingsContainer>
192:         {}
193:         <ProfileContainer>
194:           <UserInfoContainer>
195:             <CustomText variant="h3">{merchantProfile.name}</CustomText>
196:             <EmailText variant="caption">{merchantProfile.email}</EmailText>
197:             <RestaurantNameText variant="body">
198:               {merchantProfile.restaurantName}
199:             </RestaurantNameText>
200:             <StatusBadge>
201:               <StatusText>ACTIVE</StatusText>
202:             </StatusBadge>
203:           </UserInfoContainer>
204:           <AvatarContainer>
205:             <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => {}}>
206:               <Avatar.Image
207:                 size={80}
208:                 source={merchantProfile.profileImage}
209:                 backgroundColor={(props) => props.theme.colors.brand.primary}
210:               />
211:             </TouchableOpacity>
212:           </AvatarContainer>
213:         </ProfileContainer>
214: 
215:         {}
216:         <SectionContainer>
217:           <SectionTitle variant="body">ACCOUNT</SectionTitle>
218:           {renderSettingsItems(accountItems)}
219:         </SectionContainer>
220: 
221:         {}
222:         <SectionContainer>
223:           <SectionTitle variant="body">BUSINESS SETTINGS</SectionTitle>
224:           {renderSettingsItems(businessItems)}
225:         </SectionContainer>
226: 
227:         {}
228:         <SectionContainer>
229:           <SectionTitle variant="body">SYSTEM</SectionTitle>
230:           {renderSettingsItems(systemItems)}
231:         </SectionContainer>
232:       </SettingsContainer>
233:     </SafeArea>
234:   );
235: };

================
File: src/features/merchant/settings/screens/RestaurantEditScreen.js
================
  1: import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
  2: import {
  3:   ScrollView,
  4:   View,
  5:   TouchableOpacity,
  6:   TextInput,
  7:   Image,
  8:   Alert,
  9: } from "react-native";
 10: import { MaterialIcons } from "@expo/vector-icons";
 11: import * as ImagePicker from "expo-image-picker";
 12: 
 13: import { SafeArea } from "../../../../components/SafeArea/SafeArea";
 14: import { CustomText } from "../../../../components/CustomText/CustomText";
 15: 
 16: 
 17: import { sampleRestaurantData } from "../../../../data/mockEditRestaurantData";
 18: 
 19: import {
 20:   Container,
 21:   Header,
 22:   HeaderTitle,
 23:   SaveButton,
 24:   SaveButtonText,
 25:   Section,
 26:   SectionTitle,
 27:   FormGroup,
 28:   Label,
 29:   Input,
 30:   TextArea,
 31:   PhotoContainer,
 32:   PhotoItem,
 33:   PhotoImage,
 34:   AddPhotoButton,
 35:   RemovePhotoButton,
 36:   FeatureRow,
 37:   FeatureSwitch,
 38:   BusinessHoursRow,
 39:   DayLabel,
 40:   TimeInput,
 41:   ClosedCheckbox,
 42:   CuisineTag,
 43:   CuisineTagsContainer,
 44:   AddCuisineButton,
 45: } from "./RestaurantEditScreen.styles";
 46: 
 47: 
 48: export const RestaurantEditScreen = ({ navigation }) => {
 49:   const [restaurant, setRestaurant] = useState(null);
 50:   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
 51:   const [newCuisine, setNewCuisine] = useState("");
 52: 
 53:   // Load restaurant data
 54:   useEffect(() => {
 55:     // In a real app, this would be a fetch call to your API
 56:     setRestaurant(sampleRestaurantData);
 57:     setLoading(false);
 58:   }, []);
 59: 
 60:   const handleSave = () => {
 61:     // In a real app, this would send the updated data to your API
 62:     Alert.alert("Success", "Restaurant information saved successfully");
 63:   };
 64: 
 65:   const handleAddPhoto = async () => {
 66:     try {
 67:       const permissionResult =
 68:         await ImagePicker.requestMediaLibraryPermissionsAsync();
 69:       if (!permissionResult.granted) {
 70:         Alert.alert(
 71:           "Permission Required",
 72:           "Please allow access to your photo library"
 73:         );
 74:         return;
 75:       }
 76: 
 77:       const pickerResult = await ImagePicker.launchImageLibraryAsync({
 78:         allowsEditing: true,
 79:         aspect: [4, 3],
 80:         quality: 1,
 81:       });
 82: 
 83:       if (
 84:         !pickerResult.cancelled &&
 85:         pickerResult.assets &&
 86:         pickerResult.assets.length > 0
 87:       ) {
 88:         setRestaurant((prev) => ({
 89:           ...prev,
 90:           photos: [...prev.photos, pickerResult.assets[0].uri],
 91:         }));
 92:       }
 93:     } catch (error) {
 94:       console.error("Error picking image:", error);
 95:       Alert.alert("Error", "There was a problem selecting your image");
 96:     }
 97:   };
 98: 
 99:   const handleRemovePhoto = (index) => {
100:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
101:       ...prev,
102:       photos: prev.photos.filter((_, i) => i !== index),
103:     }));
104:   };
105: 
106:   const updateTextValue = (field, value) => {
107:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
108:       ...prev,
109:       [field]: value,
110:     }));
111:   };
112: 
113:   const updateNestedValue = (parent, field, value) => {
114:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
115:       ...prev,
116:       [parent]: {
117:         ...prev[parent],
118:         [field]: value,
119:       },
120:     }));
121:   };
122: 
123:   const toggleFeature = (feature) => {
124:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
125:       ...prev,
126:       features: {
127:         ...prev.features,
128:         [feature]: !prev.features[feature],
129:       },
130:     }));
131:   };
132: 
133:   const updateBusinessHours = (day, field, value) => {
134:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
135:       ...prev,
136:       businessHours: {
137:         ...prev.businessHours,
138:         [day]: {
139:           ...prev.businessHours[day],
140:           [field]: value,
141:         },
142:       },
143:     }));
144:   };
145: 
146:   const toggleDayClosed = (day) => {
147:     const isClosed = restaurant.businessHours[day].isClosed;
148:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
149:       ...prev,
150:       businessHours: {
151:         ...prev.businessHours,
152:         [day]: {
153:           ...prev.businessHours[day],
154:           isClosed: !isClosed,
155:         },
156:       },
157:     }));
158:   };
159: 
160:   const handleAddCuisine = () => {
161:     if (newCuisine.trim() === "") return;
162: 
163:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
164:       ...prev,
165:       cuisine: [...prev.cuisine, newCuisine.trim()],
166:     }));
167:     setNewCuisine("");
168:   };
169: 
170:   const handleRemoveCuisine = (index) => {
171:     setRestaurant((prev) => ({
172:       ...prev,
173:       cuisine: prev.cuisine.filter((_, i) => i !== index),
174:     }));
175:   };
176: 
177:   if (loading || !restaurant) {
178:     return (
179:       <SafeArea>
180:         <Container>
181:           <CustomText>Loading restaurant information...</CustomText>
182:         </Container>
183:       </SafeArea>
184:     );
185:   }
186: 
187:   const daysOfWeek = [
188:     "monday",
189:     "tuesday",
190:     "wednesday",
191:     "thursday",
192:     "friday",
193:     "saturday",
194:     "sunday",
195:   ];
196: 
197:   return (
198:     <SafeArea>
199:       <Container>
200:         <Header>
201:           <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}>
202:             <MaterialIcons name="arrow-back" size={24} color="#262626" />
203:           </TouchableOpacity>
204:           <HeaderTitle>Edit Restaurant</HeaderTitle>
205:           <SaveButton onPress={handleSave}>
206:             <SaveButtonText>Save</SaveButtonText>
207:           </SaveButton>
208:         </Header>
209: 
210:         {}
211:         <Section>
212:           <SectionTitle>BASIC INFORMATION</SectionTitle>
213: 
214:           <FormGroup>
215:             <Label>Restaurant Name</Label>
216:             <Input
217:               value={restaurant.name}
218:               onChangeText={(text) => updateTextValue("name", text)}
219:               placeholder="Enter restaurant name"
220:             />
221:           </FormGroup>
222: 
223:           <FormGroup>
224:             <Label>Description</Label>
225:             <TextArea
226:               value={restaurant.description}
227:               onChangeText={(text) => updateTextValue("description", text)}
228:               placeholder="Enter restaurant description"
229:               multiline={true}
230:               numberOfLines={4}
231:             />
232:           </FormGroup>
233: 
234:           <FormGroup>
235:             <Label>Cuisine Types</Label>
236:             <CuisineTagsContainer>
237:               {restaurant.cuisine.map((cuisine, index) => (
238:                 <CuisineTag key={index}>
239:                   <CustomText>{cuisine}</CustomText>
240:                   <TouchableOpacity
241:                     onPress={() => handleRemoveCuisine(index)}
242:                     style={{ marginLeft: 5 }}
243:                   >
244:                     <MaterialIcons name="close" size={16} color="#757575" />
245:                   </TouchableOpacity>
246:                 </CuisineTag>
247:               ))}
248:             </CuisineTagsContainer>
249: 
250:             <View style={{ flexDirection: "row", alignItems: "center" }}>
251:               <Input
252:                 value={newCuisine}
253:                 onChangeText={setNewCuisine}
254:                 placeholder="Add new cuisine type"
255:                 style={{ flex: 1, marginRight: 10 }}
256:               />
257:               <AddCuisineButton onPress={handleAddCuisine}>
258:                 <MaterialIcons name="add" size={16} color="#262626" />
259:                 <CustomText>Add</CustomText>
260:               </AddCuisineButton>
261:             </View>
262:           </FormGroup>
263:         </Section>
264: 
265:         {}
266:         <Section>
267:           <SectionTitle>CONTACT & LOCATION</SectionTitle>
268: 
269:           <FormGroup>
270:             <Label>Street Address</Label>
271:             <Input
272:               value={restaurant.address.street}
273:               onChangeText={(text) =>
274:                 updateNestedValue("address", "street", text)
275:               }
276:               placeholder="Enter street address"
277:             />
278:           </FormGroup>
279: 
280:           <FormGroup>
281:             <Label>City</Label>
282:             <Input
283:               value={restaurant.address.city}
284:               onChangeText={(text) =>
285:                 updateNestedValue("address", "city", text)
286:               }
287:               placeholder="Enter city"
288:             />
289:           </FormGroup>
290: 
291:           <FormGroup>
292:             <Label>State/Province</Label>
293:             <Input
294:               value={restaurant.address.state}
295:               onChangeText={(text) =>
296:                 updateNestedValue("address", "state", text)
297:               }
298:               placeholder="Enter state/province"
299:             />
300:           </FormGroup>
301: 
302:           <FormGroup>
303:             <Label>Postal Code</Label>
304:             <Input
305:               value={restaurant.address.postalCode}
306:               onChangeText={(text) =>
307:                 updateNestedValue("address", "postalCode", text)
308:               }
309:               placeholder="Enter postal code"
310:             />
311:           </FormGroup>
312: 
313:           <FormGroup>
314:             <Label>Phone Number</Label>
315:             <Input
316:               value={restaurant.phoneNumber}
317:               onChangeText={(text) => updateTextValue("phoneNumber", text)}
318:               placeholder="Enter phone number"
319:               keyboardType="phone-pad"
320:             />
321:           </FormGroup>
322: 
323:           <FormGroup>
324:             <Label>Email</Label>
325:             <Input
326:               value={restaurant.email}
327:               onChangeText={(text) => updateTextValue("email", text)}
328:               placeholder="Enter email address"
329:               keyboardType="email-address"
330:               autoCapitalize="none"
331:             />
332:           </FormGroup>
333: 
334:           <FormGroup>
335:             <Label>Website</Label>
336:             <Input
337:               value={restaurant.website}
338:               onChangeText={(text) => updateTextValue("website", text)}
339:               placeholder="Enter website URL"
340:               keyboardType="url"
341:               autoCapitalize="none"
342:             />
343:           </FormGroup>
344:         </Section>
345: 
346:         {}
347:         <Section>
348:           <SectionTitle>PHOTOS</SectionTitle>
349: 
350:           <FormGroup>
351:             <Label>Restaurant Photos</Label>
352:             <PhotoContainer>
353:               {restaurant.photos.map((photo, index) => (
354:                 <PhotoItem key={index}>
355:                   <PhotoImage source={{ uri: photo }} />
356:                   <RemovePhotoButton onPress={() => handleRemovePhoto(index)}>
357:                     <MaterialIcons name="close" size={16} color="white" />
358:                   </RemovePhotoButton>
359:                 </PhotoItem>
360:               ))}
361:               <AddPhotoButton onPress={handleAddPhoto}>
362:                 <MaterialIcons
363:                   name="add-photo-alternate"
364:                   size={24}
365:                   color="#757575"
366:                 />
367:               </AddPhotoButton>
368:             </PhotoContainer>
369:           </FormGroup>
370:         </Section>
371: 
372:         {}
373:         <Section>
374:           <SectionTitle>BUSINESS HOURS</SectionTitle>
375: 
376:           {daysOfWeek.map((day) => (
377:             <BusinessHoursRow key={day}>
378:               <DayLabel style={{ textTransform: "capitalize" }}>{day}</DayLabel>
379:               <TimeInput
380:                 value={restaurant.businessHours[day].open}
381:                 onChangeText={(text) => updateBusinessHours(day, "open", text)}
382:                 placeholder="09:00"
383:                 editable={!restaurant.businessHours[day].isClosed}
384:               />
385:               <CustomText>to</CustomText>
386:               <TimeInput
387:                 value={restaurant.businessHours[day].close}
388:                 onChangeText={(text) => updateBusinessHours(day, "close", text)}
389:                 placeholder="22:00"
390:                 editable={!restaurant.businessHours[day].isClosed}
391:               />
392:               <ClosedCheckbox onPress={() => toggleDayClosed(day)}>
393:                 <MaterialIcons
394:                   name={
395:                     restaurant.businessHours[day].isClosed
396:                       ? "check-box"
397:                       : "check-box-outline-blank"
398:                   }
399:                   size={24}
400:                   color="#262626"
401:                 />
402:                 <CustomText>Closed</CustomText>
403:               </ClosedCheckbox>
404:             </BusinessHoursRow>
405:           ))}
406: 
407:           <FormGroup style={{ marginTop: 10 }}>
408:             <FeatureRow>
409:               <FeatureSwitch
410:                 value={restaurant.isClosedTemporarily}
411:                 onValueChange={() =>
412:                   updateTextValue(
413:                     "isClosedTemporarily",
414:                     !restaurant.isClosedTemporarily
415:                   )
416:                 }
417:               />
418:               <Label>Temporarily Closed</Label>
419:             </FeatureRow>
420:           </FormGroup>
421:         </Section>
422: 
423:         {}
424:         <Section>
425:           <SectionTitle>FEATURES & AMENITIES</SectionTitle>
426: 
427:           <FormGroup>
428:             <FeatureRow>
429:               <FeatureSwitch
430:                 value={restaurant.features.hasWifi}
431:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("hasWifi")}
432:               />
433:               <Label>Wi-Fi Available</Label>
434:             </FeatureRow>
435: 
436:             <FeatureRow>
437:               <FeatureSwitch
438:                 value={restaurant.features.hasParking}
439:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("hasParking")}
440:               />
441:               <Label>Parking Available</Label>
442:             </FeatureRow>
443: 
444:             <FeatureRow>
445:               <FeatureSwitch
446:                 value={restaurant.features.isWheelchairAccessible}
447:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("isWheelchairAccessible")}
448:               />
449:               <Label>Wheelchair Accessible</Label>
450:             </FeatureRow>
451: 
452:             <FeatureRow>
453:               <FeatureSwitch
454:                 value={restaurant.features.allowsPets}
455:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("allowsPets")}
456:               />
457:               <Label>Pet Friendly</Label>
458:             </FeatureRow>
459: 
460:             <FeatureRow>
461:               <FeatureSwitch
462:                 value={restaurant.features.hasOutdoorSeating}
463:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("hasOutdoorSeating")}
464:               />
465:               <Label>Outdoor Seating</Label>
466:             </FeatureRow>
467: 
468:             <FeatureRow>
469:               <FeatureSwitch
470:                 value={restaurant.features.hasTakeout}
471:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("hasTakeout")}
472:               />
473:               <Label>Takeout Available</Label>
474:             </FeatureRow>
475: 
476:             <FeatureRow>
477:               <FeatureSwitch
478:                 value={restaurant.features.hasDelivery}
479:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("hasDelivery")}
480:               />
481:               <Label>Delivery Available</Label>
482:             </FeatureRow>
483: 
484:             <FeatureRow>
485:               <FeatureSwitch
486:                 value={restaurant.features.acceptsReservations}
487:                 onValueChange={() => toggleFeature("acceptsReservations")}
488:               />
489:               <Label>Accepts Reservations</Label>
490:             </FeatureRow>
491:           </FormGroup>
492:         </Section>
493: 
494:         {}
495:         <Section>
496:           <SectionTitle>SOCIAL MEDIA</SectionTitle>
497: 
498:           <FormGroup>
499:             <Label>Instagram</Label>
500:             <Input
501:               value={restaurant.socialMedia.instagram}
502:               onChangeText={(text) =>
503:                 updateNestedValue("socialMedia", "instagram", text)
504:               }
505:               placeholder="Instagram URL"
506:               autoCapitalize="none"
507:             />
508:           </FormGroup>
509: 
510:           <FormGroup>
511:             <Label>Facebook</Label>
512:             <Input
513:               value={restaurant.socialMedia.facebook}
514:               onChangeText={(text) =>
515:                 updateNestedValue("socialMedia", "facebook", text)
516:               }
517:               placeholder="Facebook URL"
518:               autoCapitalize="none"
519:             />
520:           </FormGroup>
521: 
522:           <FormGroup>
523:             <Label>Twitter</Label>
524:             <Input
525:               value={restaurant.socialMedia.twitter}
526:               onChangeText={(text) =>
527:                 updateNestedValue("socialMedia", "twitter", text)
528:               }
529:               placeholder="Twitter URL"
530:               autoCapitalize="none"
531:             />
532:           </FormGroup>
533: 
534:           <FormGroup>
535:             <Label>Yelp</Label>
536:             <Input
537:               value={restaurant.socialMedia.yelp}
538:               onChangeText={(text) =>
539:                 updateNestedValue("socialMedia", "yelp", text)
540:               }
541:               placeholder="Yelp URL"
542:               autoCapitalize="none"
543:             />
544:           </FormGroup>
545:         </Section>
546: 
547:         {}
548:         <Section>
549:           <SectionTitle>RESERVATION SETTINGS</SectionTitle>
550: 
551:           <FormGroup>
552:             <Label>Time Slot Duration (minutes)</Label>
553:             <Input
554:               value={restaurant.settings.reservationTimeSlotDuration.toString()}
555:               onChangeText={(text) => {
556:                 const value = parseInt(text) || 0;
557:                 updateNestedValue(
558:                   "settings",
559:                   "reservationTimeSlotDuration",
560:                   value
561:                 );
562:               }}
563:               placeholder="30"
564:               keyboardType="number-pad"
565:             />
566:           </FormGroup>
567: 
568:           <FormGroup>
569:             <Label>Maximum Party Size</Label>
570:             <Input
571:               value={restaurant.settings.maxReservationSize.toString()}
572:               onChangeText={(text) => {
573:                 const value = parseInt(text) || 0;
574:                 updateNestedValue("settings", "maxReservationSize", value);
575:               }}
576:               placeholder="20"
577:               keyboardType="number-pad"
578:             />
579:           </FormGroup>
580: 
581:           <FormGroup>
582:             <Label>Minimum Advance Notice (hours)</Label>
583:             <Input
584:               value={restaurant.settings.reservationLeadTime.toString()}
585:               onChangeText={(text) => {
586:                 const value = parseInt(text) || 0;
587:                 updateNestedValue("settings", "reservationLeadTime", value);
588:               }}
589:               placeholder="1"
590:               keyboardType="number-pad"
591:             />
592:           </FormGroup>
593: 
594:           <FormGroup>
595:             <FeatureRow>
596:               <FeatureSwitch
597:                 value={restaurant.settings.automaticConfirmation}
598:                 onValueChange={() =>
599:                   updateNestedValue(
600:                     "settings",
601:                     "automaticConfirmation",
602:                     !restaurant.settings.automaticConfirmation
603:                   )
604:                 }
605:               />
606:               <Label>Automatic Reservation Confirmation</Label>
607:             </FeatureRow>
608:           </FormGroup>
609:         </Section>
610:       </Container>
611:     </SafeArea>
612:   );
613: };

================
File: src/features/merchant/settings/screens/RestaurantEditScreen.styles.js
================
  1: import styled from "styled-components/native";
  2: import { CustomText } from "../../../../components/CustomText/CustomText";
  3: 
  4: 
  5: export const Container = styled.ScrollView`
  6:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.primary};
  7:   flex: 1;
  8:   margin: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
  9: `;
 10: 
 11: export const Header = styled.View`
 12:   flex-direction: row;
 13:   align-items: center;
 14:   justify-content: space-between;
 15:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 16: `;
 17: 
 18: export const HeaderTitle = styled(CustomText)`
 19:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.title};
 20:   font-weight: ${(props) => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
 21: `;
 22: 
 23: export const SaveButton = styled.TouchableOpacity`
 24:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.ui.primary};
 25:   padding-vertical: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 26:   padding-horizontal: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 27:   border-radius: 5px;
 28: `;
 29: 
 30: export const SaveButtonText = styled(CustomText)`
 31:   color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.primary};
 32: `;
 33: 
 34: export const Section = styled.View`
 35:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[4]};
 36: `;
 37: 
 38: export const SectionTitle = styled(CustomText)`
 39:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.body};
 40:   font-weight: ${(props) => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
 41:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 42:   padding-horizontal: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 43: `;
 44: 
 45: export const FormGroup = styled.View`
 46:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 47:   padding-horizontal: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
 48: `;
 49: 
 50: export const Label = styled(CustomText)`
 51:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.body};
 52:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
 53: `;
 54: 
 55: export const Input = styled.TextInput`
 56:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.secondary};
 57:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 58:   border-radius: 5px;
 59:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.body};
 60: `;
 61: 
 62: export const TextArea = styled(Input)`
 63:   min-height: 100px;
 64:   text-align-vertical: top;
 65: `;
 66: 
 67: export const PhotoContainer = styled.View`
 68:   flex-direction: row;
 69:   flex-wrap: wrap;
 70:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
 71: `;
 72: 
 73: export const PhotoItem = styled.View`
 74:   width: 100px;
 75:   height: 100px;
 76:   margin: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
 77:   border-radius: 5px;
 78:   overflow: hidden;
 79:   position: relative;
 80: `;
 81: 
 82: export const PhotoImage = styled.Image`
 83:   width: 100%;
 84:   height: 100%;
 85: `;
 86: 
 87: export const AddPhotoButton = styled.TouchableOpacity`
 88:   width: 100px;
 89:   height: 100px;
 90:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.secondary};
 91:   justify-content: center;
 92:   align-items: center;
 93:   margin: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
 94:   border-radius: 5px;
 95:   border: 1px dashed ${(props) => props.theme.colors.ui.secondary};
 96: `;
 97: 
 98: export const RemovePhotoButton = styled.TouchableOpacity`
 99:   position: absolute;
100:   top: 5px;
101:   right: 5px;
102:   background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
103:   width: 24px;
104:   height: 24px;
105:   border-radius: 12px;
106:   justify-content: center;
107:   align-items: center;
108: `;
109: 
110: export const FeatureRow = styled.View`
111:   flex-direction: row;
112:   align-items: center;
113:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
114: `;
115: 
116: export const FeatureSwitch = styled.Switch`
117:   margin-right: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
118: `;
119: 
120: export const BusinessHoursRow = styled.View`
121:   flex-direction: row;
122:   justify-content: space-between;
123:   align-items: center;
124:   margin-left: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
125:   margin-right: ${(props) => props.theme.space[3]};
126: `;
127: 
128: export const DayLabel = styled(CustomText)`
129:   width: 100px;
130: `;
131: 
132: export const TimeInput = styled.TextInput`
133:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.bg.secondary};
134:   padding: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
135:   border-radius: 5px;
136:   width: 80px;
137:   font-size: ${(props) => props.theme.fontSizes.body};
138:   text-align: center;
139: `;
140: 
141: export const ClosedCheckbox = styled.TouchableOpacity`
142:   flex-direction: row;
143:   align-items: center;
144: `;
145: 
146: export const CuisineTag = styled.TouchableOpacity`
147:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.ui.tertiary};
148:   padding-vertical: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
149:   padding-horizontal: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
150:   border-radius: 20px;
151:   margin-right: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
152:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
153:   flex-direction: row;
154:   align-items: center;
155: `;
156: 
157: export const CuisineTagsContainer = styled.View`
158:   flex-direction: row;
159:   flex-wrap: wrap;
160:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
161: `;
162: 
163: export const AddCuisineButton = styled.TouchableOpacity`
164:   flex-direction: row;
165:   align-items: center;
166:   background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.ui.tertiary};
167:   padding-vertical: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
168:   padding-horizontal: ${(props) => props.theme.space[2]};
169:   border-radius: 20px;
170:   margin-bottom: ${(props) => props.theme.space[1]};
171: `;

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/AppNavigator.js
================
  1: import React from "react";
  2: import { createBottomTabNavigator } from "@react-navigation/bottom-tabs";
  3: import { createStackNavigator } from "@react-navigation/stack";
  4: import { Ionicons } from "@expo/vector-icons";
  5: import { NavigationContainer } from "@react-navigation/native";
  6: 
  7: import { useAuthentication } from "../../services/AuthenticationContext";
  8: import { globalScreenOptions } from "../options/GlobalScreenOptions";
  9: import { RestaurantsNavigator } from "./RestaurantsNavigator";
 10: import { CheckoutNavigator } from "./CheckoutNavigator";
 11: import { ReservationsNavigator } from "./ReservationsNavigator";
 12: import { MerchantNavigator } from "./MerchantNavigator";
 13: import { SettingsNavigator } from "./SettingsNavigator";
 14: import { RestaurantDetailScreen } from "../../features/customer/restaurants/screens/RestaurantDetailScreen";
 15: import { AccountSettingsScreen } from "../../features/customer/settings/screens/AccountSettingsScreen";
 16: 
 17: const TAB_ICON = {
 18:   Restaurants: "restaurant",
 19:   Checkout: "cart",
 20:   Reservations: "book",
 21:   Settings: "settings",
 22: };
 23: 
 24: const Tab = createBottomTabNavigator();
 25: const Stack = createStackNavigator();
 26: 
 27: const createTabScreenOptions = ({ route }) => {
 28:   const iconName = TAB_ICON[route.name];
 29: 
 30:   return {
 31:     tabBarIcon: ({ size, color }) => (
 32:       <Ionicons name={iconName} size={size} color={color} />
 33:     ),
 34:   };
 35: };
 36: 
 37: 
 38: const HomeTabs = () => (
 39:   <Tab.Navigator screenOptions={createTabScreenOptions}>
 40:     <Tab.Screen
 41:       name="Restaurants"
 42:       component={RestaurantsNavigator}
 43:       options={{ headerShown: false }}
 44:     />
 45:     <Tab.Screen
 46:       name="Checkout"
 47:       component={CheckoutNavigator}
 48:       options={{ headerShown: false }}
 49:     />
 50:     <Tab.Screen
 51:       name="Reservations"
 52:       component={ReservationsNavigator}
 53:       options={{ header: () => null }}
 54:     />
 55:     <Tab.Screen
 56:       name="Settings"
 57:       component={SettingsNavigator}
 58:       options={{ headerShown: false }}
 59:     />
 60:   </Tab.Navigator>
 61: );
 62: 
 63: 
 64: export const AppNavigator = () => {
 65:   const { user } = useAuthentication();
 66:   const role = user?.role;
 67:   return (
 68:     <Stack.Navigator
 69:       screenOptions={{
 70:         headerShown: false,
 71:       }}
 72:     >
 73:       {role === "customer" ? (
 74:         <>
 75:           {}
 76:           <Stack.Screen name="Home" component={HomeTabs} />
 77:           {}
 78: 
 79:           <Stack.Screen
 80:             name="RestaurantDetailScreen"
 81:             component={RestaurantDetailScreen}
 82:             options={({ route }) => ({
 83:               ...globalScreenOptions.restaurantDetail,
 84:               presentation:
 85:                 route.params?.presentationStyle === "modal" ? "modal" : "card",
 86:             })}
 87:           />
 88:           <Stack.Screen
 89:             name="AccountSettings"
 90:             component={AccountSettingsScreen}
 91:             options={globalScreenOptions.common}
 92:           />
 93:         </>
 94:       ) : (
 95:         <>
 96:           <Stack.Screen name="Merchant" component={MerchantNavigator} />
 97:         </>
 98:       )}
 99:     </Stack.Navigator>
100:   );
101: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/AuthNavigator.js
================
 1: import React from "react";
 2: import { createStackNavigator } from "@react-navigation/stack";
 3: 
 4: import { LoginScreen } from "../../features/auth/screens/LoginScreen";
 5: import { globalScreenOptions } from "../options/GlobalScreenOptions";
 6: 
 7: const Stack = createStackNavigator();
 8: 
 9: export const AuthNavigator = () => {
10:   return (
11:     <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={globalScreenOptions.nonHeader}>
12:       <Stack.Screen name="Login" component={LoginScreen} />
13:       {}
14:     </Stack.Navigator>
15:   );
16: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/CheckoutNavigator.js
================
 1: import React from "react";
 2: import {
 3:   ScrollView,
 4:   TextInput,
 5:   Text,
 6:   TouchableOpacity,
 7:   View,
 8:   StyleSheet,
 9: } from "react-native";
10: import * as FileSystem from "expo-file-system";
11: 
12: import { createStackNavigator } from "@react-navigation/stack";
13: 
14: const CheckoutStack = createStackNavigator();
15: 
16: export const CheckoutNavigator = () => {
17:   return (
18:     <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
19:       <Text>Checkout Navigator</Text>
20:     </View>
21:   );
22: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/index.js
================
 1: import { NavigationContainer } from "@react-navigation/native";
 2: import { AppNavigator } from "./AppNavigator";
 3: import { GlobalWrapper } from "../../components/GlobalWrapper/GlobalWrapper";
 4: import { AuthNavigator } from "./AuthNavigator";
 5: import { useAuthentication } from "../../services/AuthenticationContext";
 6: 
 7: export const Navigation = () => {
 8:   const { isAuthenticated } = useAuthentication();
 9: 
10:   return (
11:     <GlobalWrapper>
12:       <NavigationContainer>
13:         {isAuthenticated ? <AppNavigator /> : <AuthNavigator />}
14:       </NavigationContainer>
15:     </GlobalWrapper>
16:   );
17: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/MerchantNavigator.js
================
 1: import React from "react";
 2: import { createBottomTabNavigator } from "@react-navigation/bottom-tabs";
 3: import { createStackNavigator } from "@react-navigation/stack";
 4: import { Ionicons } from "@expo/vector-icons";
 5: import { useTheme } from "styled-components/native";
 6: 
 7: import { MerchantHomeScreen } from "../../features/merchant/dashboard/screens/MerchantHomeScreen";
 8: import { MerchantSettingsScreen } from "../../features/merchant/settings/screens/MerchantSettingsScreen";
 9: import { MerchantReservationsScreen } from "../../features/merchant/reservations/screens/MerchantReservationsScreen";
10: import { RestaurantEditScreen } from "../../features/merchant/settings/screens/RestaurantEditScreen";
11: 
12: const Tab = createBottomTabNavigator();
13: const Stack = createStackNavigator();
14: 
15: const SettingsStack = () => {
16:   return (
17:     <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false }}>
18:       <Stack.Screen name="SettingsMain" component={MerchantSettingsScreen} />
19:       <Stack.Screen name="RestaurantEdit" component={RestaurantEditScreen} />
20:     </Stack.Navigator>
21:   );
22: };
23: 
24: export const MerchantNavigator = () => {
25:   const theme = useTheme();
26:   return (
27:     <Tab.Navigator
28:       screenOptions={({ route }) => ({
29:         headerShown: false,
30:         tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => {
31:           let iconName;
32:           if (route.name === "Home") {
33:             iconName = "home";
34:           } else if (route.name === "Settings") {
35:             iconName = "settings";
36:           } else if (route.name === "Reservations") {
37:             iconName = "calendar";
38:           }
39:           return <Ionicons name={iconName} size={size} color={color} />;
40:         },
41:         tabBarActiveTintColor: theme.colors.text.primary,
42:         tabBarInactiveTintColor: theme.colors.text.secondary,
43:         tabBarStyle: {
44:           backgroundColor: theme.colors.bg.primary,
45:         },
46:       })}
47:     >
48:       <Tab.Screen name="Home" component={MerchantHomeScreen} />
49:       <Tab.Screen name="Reservations" component={MerchantReservationsScreen} />
50:       <Tab.Screen name="Settings" component={SettingsStack} />
51:     </Tab.Navigator>
52:   );
53: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/ReservationsNavigator.js
================
 1: import React from "react";
 2: import { createStackNavigator } from "@react-navigation/stack";
 3: import { useTheme } from "styled-components/native";
 4: 
 5: import { ReservationsScreen } from "../../features/customer/reservations/screens/ReservationsScreen";
 6: 
 7: const ReservationStack = createStackNavigator();
 8: 
 9: export const ReservationsNavigator = () => {
10:   const theme = useTheme();
11:   const getNumericValue = (value) => parseInt(value.replace("px", ""), 10);
12: 
13:   return (
14:     <ReservationStack.Navigator
15:       screenOptions={{
16:         headerShown: true,
17:         headerTitleAlign: "left",
18:         headerTintColor: theme.colors.text.primary,
19:         headerStyle: {
20:           backgroundColor: theme.colors.bg.primary,
21:           shadowColor: "transparent",
22:           elevation: 0,
23:         },
24:         headerTitleStyle: {
25:           fontSize: getNumericValue(theme.fontSizes.h4),
26:           fontFamily: theme.fonts.heading,
27:           fontWeight: theme.fontWeights.regular,
28:           lineHeight: getNumericValue(theme.fontSizes.h2),
29:           paddingLeft: getNumericValue(theme.space[2]),
30:         },
31:       }}
32:     >
33:       <ReservationStack.Screen
34:         name="ReservationsScreen"
35:         component={ReservationsScreen}
36:         options={{
37:           headerTitle: "Reservations",
38:         }}
39:       />
40:     </ReservationStack.Navigator>
41:   );
42: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/RestaurantsNavigator.js
================
 1: import React from "react";
 2: import { ScrollView, TextInput, Text, TouchableOpacity } from "react-native";
 3: import {
 4:   createStackNavigator,
 5:   TransitionPresets,
 6: } from "@react-navigation/stack";
 7: 
 8: import { RestaurantsScreen } from "../../features/customer/restaurants/screens/RestaurantsScreen";
 9: import { RestaurantDetailScreen } from "../../features/customer/restaurants/screens/RestaurantDetailScreen";
10: 
11: const RestaurantStack = createStackNavigator();
12: 
13: export const RestaurantsNavigator = () => {
14:   return (
15: 
16:     <RestaurantStack.Navigator
17:       screenOptions={{
18:         headerShown: false,
19:         ...TransitionPresets.ModalPresentationIOS,
20:       }}
21:     >
22:       <RestaurantStack.Screen
23:         name="RestaurantsScreen"
24:         component={RestaurantsScreen}
25:         options={{ headerShown: false }}
26:       />
27:     </RestaurantStack.Navigator>
28:   );
29: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/navigation/SettingsNavigator.js
================
 1: import React from "react";
 2: import {
 3:   createStackNavigator,
 4:   CardStyleInterpolators,
 5: } from "@react-navigation/stack";
 6: 
 7: import { SettingsScreen } from "../../features/customer/settings/screens/SettingsScreen";
 8: 
 9: const SettingsStack = createStackNavigator();
10: 
11: export const SettingsNavigator = () => {
12:   return (
13:     <SettingsStack.Navigator
14:       screenOptions={{
15:         headerShown: false,
16:         cardStyleInterpolator: CardStyleInterpolators.forHorizontalIOS,
17:       }}
18:     >
19:       <SettingsStack.Screen name="SettingsScreen" component={SettingsScreen} />
20:     </SettingsStack.Navigator>
21:   );
22: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/options/GlobalScreenOptions.js
================
 1: import { Platform } from "react-native";
 2: import { colors } from "../../infrastructure/theme/colors";
 3: import { TransitionPresets } from "@react-navigation/stack";
 4: 
 5: const commonHeaderOptions = {
 6:   headerStyle: {
 7:     height: Platform.select({ ios: 56, android: 66 }),
 8:     backgroundColor: colors.bg.primary,
 9:   },
10:   headerTitleStyle: {
11:     fontWeight: "bold",
12:     fontSize: 20,
13:     color: colors.text.primary,
14:     textAlign: "center",
15:   },
16:   headerBackTitleVisible: false,
17:   headerTitleAlign: "center",
18:   headerLeftContainerStyle: {
19:     marginTop: Platform.select({ ios: -45, android: -41 }),
20:   },
21:   headerTitleContainerStyle: {
22:     marginTop: Platform.select({ ios: -50, android: -45 }),
23:   },
24: };
25: 
26: 
27: export const globalScreenOptions = {
28:   common: commonHeaderOptions,
29:   nonHeader: {
30:     ...commonHeaderOptions,
31:     headerShown: false,
32:   },
33:   restaurantDetail: {
34:     headerShown: false,
35: 
36: 
37: 
38:   },
39: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/theme/colors.js
================
 1: export const colors = {
 2:   brand: {
 3:     primary: "#FFFFFF",
 4:     secondary: "#757575",
 5:     muted: "#C6DAF7",
 6:   },
 7:   ui: {
 8:     primary: "#262626",
 9:     secondary: "#757575",
10:     tertiary: "#F1F1F1",
11:     quaternary: "#FFFFFF",
12:     disabled: "#DEDEDE",
13:     error: "#D0421B",
14:     success: "#138000",
15:   },
16:   bg: {
17:     primary: "#FFFFFF",
18:     secondary: "#F1F1F1",
19:   },
20:   text: {
21:     primary: "#262626",
22:     secondary: "#757575",
23:     disabled: "#9C9C9C",
24:     inverse: "#FFFFFF",
25:     error: "#D0421B",
26:     success: "#138000",
27:   },
28: };

================
File: src/infrastructure/theme/fonts.js
================
 1: export const fonts = {
 2:   body: "Oswald_400Regular",
 3:   heading: "Lato_400Regular",
 4:   monospace: "Oswald_400Regular",
 5: };
 6: 
 7: export const fontWeights = {
 8:   regular: 400,
 9:   medium: 500,
10:   bold: 700,
11: };
12: 
13: export const fontSizes = {
14:   caption: "12px",
15:   button: "14px",
16:   body: "16px",
17:   title: "20px",
18:   h5: "24px",
19:   h4: "34px",
20:   h3: "45px",
21:   h2: "56px",
22:   h1: "112px",
23: };

File: src/infrastructure/theme/index.js
================
 1: import { colors } from './colors';
 2: import { sizes } from './sizes';
 3: import { space, lineHeights } from './spacing';
 4: import { fonts, fontWeights, fontSizes } from './fonts';
 5: 
 6: export const theme = {
 7:   colors,
 8:   sizes,
 9:   space,
10:   lineHeights,
11:   fonts,
12:   fontSizes,
13:   fontWeights,
14: };

2:     title: '28px',
3:     copy: '20px',
4:   };
5: 
6:   export const space = ['0px', '4px', '8px', '16px', '32px', '64px'];

  2:   common: {
  3:     languages: {
  4:       en: "英語",

================
File: src/services/i18n/locales/zh/zh.js
================
  1: export default {
  2:   common: {
  3:     languages: {
  4:       en: "英文",
  5:       ja: "日文",
  6:       zh: "中文",
  7:     },
  8:     actions: {
  9:       save: "保存",
 10:       cancel: "取消",
 11:       confirm: "确认",

================
File: src/services/i18n/index.js
================
 1: import i18n from "i18next";
 2: import { initReactI18next } from "react-i18next";
 3: import intervalPlural from "i18next-intervalplural-postprocessor";
 4: import * as RNLocalize from "react-native-localize";
 5: 
 6: 
 7: import en from "./locales/en/en";
 8: import ja from "./locales/ja/ja";
 9: import zh from "./locales/zh/zh";
10: const resources = {
11:   en: {
12:     common: en.common,
13:     auth: en.auth,
14:     restaurant: en.restaurant,
15: 
16:   },
17:   ja: {
18:     common: ja.common,
19:     auth: ja.auth,
20:     restaurant: ja.restaurant,
21: 
22:   },
23:   zh: {
24:     common: zh.common,
25:     auth: zh.auth,
26:     restaurant: zh.restaurant,
27: 
28:   },
29: };
30: 
31: const deviceLanguage = RNLocalize.getLocales()[0].languageCode;
32: const supportedLanguages = ["en", "ja", "zh"];
33: 
34: 
35: i18n
36:   .use(initReactI18next)
37:   .use(intervalPlural)
38:   .init({
39:     resources,
40:     lng: supportedLanguages.includes(deviceLanguage) ? deviceLanguage : "en",
41:     fallbackLng: "en",
42:     ns: ["common", "auth", "restaurant", "reservations", "settings"],
43:     defaultNS: "common",
44:     interpolation: {
45:       escapeValue: false,
46:     },
47:   });
48: 
49: export default i18n;

================
File: src/services/AuthenticationContext.js
================
 1: import React, { useState, createContext, useContext } from "react";
 2: 
 3: export const AuthenticationContext = createContext();
 4: 
 5: export const AuthenticationContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
 6:   const [user, setUser] = useState(null);
 7:   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
 8:   const [error, setError] = useState(null);
 9: 
10: 
11:   const onLogin = async (username, password, role) => {
12:     setIsLoading(true);
13:     setError(null);
14: 
15: 
16:     setTimeout(() => {
17: 
18:       if (username === "+1123" && password === "123123") {
19:         setUser({ username, role });
20:       } else {
21:         setError("Invalid credentials");
22:       }
23:       setIsLoading(false);
24:     }, 1000);
25:   };
26: 
27: 
28:   const onRegister = async (username, password, repeatedPassword, role) => {
29:     setIsLoading(true);
30:     setError(null);
31: 
32:     if (password !== repeatedPassword) {
33:       setError("Passwords do not match");
34:       setIsLoading(false);
35:       return;
36:     }
37: 
38: 
39:     setTimeout(() => {
40: 
41:       setUser({ username, role });
42:       setIsLoading(false);
43:     }, 1000);
44:   };
45: 
46:   const onLogout = () => {
47:     setUser(null);
48:   };
49: 
50:   return (
51:     <AuthenticationContext.Provider
52:       value={{
53:         user,
54:         isAuthenticated: !!user,
55:         isLoading,
56:         error,
57:         onLogin,
58:         onRegister,
59:         onLogout,
60:       }}
61:     >
62:       {children}
63:     </AuthenticationContext.Provider>
64:   );
65: };
66: 
67: 
68: export const useAuthentication = () => useContext(AuthenticationContext);

================
File: src/services/LanguageContext.js
================
 1: import React, { createContext, useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react";
 2: import AsyncStorage from "@react-native-async-storage/async-storage";
 3: import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next";
 4: 
 5: export const LanguageContext = createContext();
 6: 
 7: export const LanguageContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
 8:   const { i18n } = useTranslation();
 9:   const [currentLanguage, setCurrentLanguage] = useState(i18n.language);
10:   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
11: 
12: 
13:   useEffect(() => {
14:     loadSavedLanguage();
15:   }, []);
16: 
17:   const loadSavedLanguage = async () => {
18:     try {
19:       const savedLanguage = await AsyncStorage.getItem("userLanguage");
20:       if (savedLanguage) {
21:         setCurrentLanguage(savedLanguage);
22:       }
23:     } catch (error) {
24:       console.error("Failed to load language preference:", error);
25:     } finally {
26:       setIsLoading(false);
27:     }
28:   };
29: 
30:   const changeLanguage = async (languageCode) => {
31:     try {
32:       setCurrentLanguage(languageCode);
33:       await i18n.changeLanguage(languageCode);
34:       await AsyncStorage.setItem("userLanguage", languageCode);
35:     } catch (error) {
36:       console.error("Failed to save language preference:", error);
37:     }
38:   };
39: 
40:   return (
41:     <LanguageContext.Provider
42:       value={{
43:         currentLanguage,
44:         changeLanguage,
45:         isLoading,
46:       }}
47:     >
48:       {children}
49:     </LanguageContext.Provider>
50:   );
51: };
52: 
53: export const useLanguage = () => useContext(LanguageContext);

================

2: assets/
3: android/
4: node_modules/

34:

37:

45: # @end expo-cli

================
File: App.js
================
 1: import { theme } from "./src/infrastructure/theme";
 2: import { ThemeProvider } from "styled-components/native";
 3: import { AuthenticationContextProvider } from "./src/services/AuthenticationContext";
 4: import { LanguageContextProvider } from "./src/services/LanguageContext";
 5: import { Navigation } from "./src/infrastructure/navigation";
 6: import { StatusBar as ExpoStatusBar } from "expo-status-bar";
 7: import "./src/services/i18n";
 8: import Constants from "expo-constants";
 9: 
10: export default function App() {
11:   return (
12:     <>
13:       <LanguageContextProvider>
14:         <AuthenticationContextProvider>
15:           <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
16:             <Navigation />
17:           </ThemeProvider>
18:         </AuthenticationContextProvider>
19:       </LanguageContextProvider>
20:       <ExpoStatusBar style="auto" />
21:     </>
22:   );
23: }

================
File: tsconfig.json
================
 1: {
 2:   "extends": "expo/tsconfig.base",
 3:   "compilerOptions": {
 4:     "jsx": "react-jsx",
 5:     "strict": true,
 6:     "paths": {
 7:       "@/*": [
 8:         "./*"
 9:       ]
10:     }
11:   },
12:   "include": [
13:     "**/*.ts",
14:     "**/*.tsx",
15:     ".expo/types/**/*.ts",
16:     "expo-env.d.ts"
17:   ]
18: }
